p: In recent years researchers have focused their attention on the biological activities of essential oils (EOs) and their constituents of different Mentha species from several research organizations of the world. Bacteria and fungi are important pathogens of the crops as well as stored food commodities; reported to cause 40â€“50% losses ( Pandey et al., 2017). Here we have reviewed the activity of essential oils of different Mentha species against plant fungal pathogens and stored product insects, their mechanism as well as their applications in the postharvest.
